summary: Auckland is a big city in New Zealand, with about 1.5 million people living there. It's known for its beautiful harbors and volcanoes. The city was first settled by MƒÅori people and later became the capital of New Zealand for a short time. It has a mix of cultures, with many people from Asia and the Pacific Islands. Auckland is famous for its museums, art galleries, and the Sky Tower. It's also a great place for sports and has a busy airport. People often say it's one of the best places to live because of its quality of life.
title: Auckland
